item.title: Prism Johnson . Hits Intraday High with Strong Trading Momentum
item.description: Prism Johnson . demonstrated robust intraday performance on 23 Dec 2025, surging to an intraday high of Rs 144.75, reflecting a gain of 11.47% during the trading session. The stock outpaced its sector peers and the broader market, supported by heightened volatility and sustained buying interest throughout the day. Time: 12 minutes ago

item.title: Jindal Drilling & Industries Hits Intraday High with Strong 8.14% Surge
